entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
